about_the_game:
CRUFT is a cozy, incremental, crafter where you pull up to a vacant lot and craft however you like. It's all about bootstrapping from next to nothing and making a space that represents what you like to do and make.

There's tons of things to craft, some contacts on your cell phone willing to buy and sell items, and you can always just pack some things up in your van and sell items in town.

The process of crafting items also creates CRUFT. CRUFT is garbage, waste, the bits of the tomato plant you don't eat, even just wasted effort. Keep your yard clean and free of CRUFT so that you have space to do what you want to do. Or... go full goblin and make a mess. It's your yard.
